column4: I have no sound whenever i open youtube, but if i shut down and open up my computer, i hear the welcoming sound, what is wrong with my ubuntu
sounds like you've got a problem with flash player
even though i can play the video? the issue i am encountering is the sounds
yes. that's a common problem
what version of flash player plugin are you using
type about:plugins in firefox and it'll tell you
yes, but you should use version 9
you should get them from backports since it would be easier for you.
anything easier
that's as easy as it gets
sorry :/
pm me and i'll see if i can get you sorted out
nope
that's awesome, howd you get it
you mean play them?
audacious. sudo apt-get install audacious
it says Could not find ..
alright try xmms. sudo apt-get install xmms
should the file be in .cda format
no
did you get xmms going
in xmms you click Add then Dir and then locate your cd to listen to. i think it's /media/cdrom or something
run sudo alsamixer and check your volume controls. mainly "Aux"
